      • formatStatusScreens

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> formatStatusScreens(java.util.List<java.lang.String> out)
        Parameters:
        out - - List
        Returns:
        a string list with all lines split at a middle-ish " " and shortened so that they fit equally into 80 characters chat line. Please do not pass this anything longer than 159 characters.
